name: lenegcon1d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wb(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c0), cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: Contraposition of negative in 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
